name: Design
description: Creative and unique designs to give your website a twist.

skills.name: UI
skills.description: UI is knowing the patterns that make an interface usable and familiar to the users, and the ability to make it look good.

skills.name: Photoshop
skills.description: I have been working with Adobe Photoshop for at least 10 years, so I have extensive knowledge of the software.

skills.name: Illustrator
skills.description: My workflow involves using Illustrator in all the vector artworks such as logos and icons

skills.name: Indesign
skills.description: I use Indesign when I need a presentation that makes a good impression.

skills.name: After Effects
skills.description: I use after effects for interaction design and animations.

skills.name: Icon Design
skills.description: Pixel perfect vector icon design that loooks sharp on the browser

skills.name: Flat Design
skills.description: I love simplicity and flat design is more than just a fade.

name: Front-end Development
description: Hand written and standard compilant code to adapt your project to any device.

skills.name: HTML 5
skills.description: Semantic and clean HTML 5 markup. I  work with accessibility in mind.

skills.name: CSS 3
skills.description: Organized Cascade style sheets using the latest conventions like BEM or atomic CSS.

skills.name: SASS
skills.description: SASS is my preprocessor of choice, I prefer to keep it light with only the bare minimum of variables and mixins to help theming

skills.name: Javascript
skills.description: My programming language of choice, I love JS, you can easily find me in conventions near Bologna.

skills.name: React
skills.description: My library of choice for quick prototyping and modular development.

skills.name: AngularJS
skills.description: My framework of choice for more complex web applications.

name: User Experience
description: Clean, crisp, readable, easy to navigate interfaces with user driven design.

skills.name: Mockup
skills.description: With quick mockups I can bring your project to life. This helps you be on the same page with your clients and your development team.
skills.pro: I can help you quickly bring your project to a tangible form you can show to your clients.

skills.name: Prototyping
skills.description: Prototypes help you visualize the application flow, it's essential to spot any usability issue early on your project.

skills.name: UX
skills.description: Everything is UX, I'll help you polish your user flows and your personas with simplicity in mind.
